extendedInfo.description: Classic cribbage where 2 players race to 121 points with single player or online multiplayer & Contests for real prizes!Play the powerful computer opponent or go online with other players world wide!Features: â Single player or Online Multiplayer (Cross-Platform iOS and Android) - Multiplayer trial of 2/day for 2 weeks - Unlimited multiplayer with purchaseâ Multiplayer Contests* - Play for Gold prizes you can cash-out! - Not Gambling, See: http://bit.ly/notgambleâ Multiplayer "tournament" options - Play best of 1, 3, 5 or 7 games to winâ 3 single player difficulty levelsâ True random shuffle through random.orgâ 80+ single player achievements possibleâ Features Kiip real world rewardsâ Simple and intuitive game playâ Shuffle, scoring & other sound effectsâ Detailed stats & "Top 50" leaderboard - Seperate for single player & multiplayerâ Over 50 in-game avatars to choose fromâ Custom avatars w/ your own imageâ Manual counting option w/ mugginsâ Single player hints to learn cribbageâ "Cut for first deal" to balance the oddsâ Multiple game boards, backgrounds & cardsâ Options for auto-play on selection or confirm, auto-cut the deck and more!â Add a friend, send private messages or chat*Contests available in the UK, US & Canada only**See Terms & Conditions for details*** Please Email us your issues/ideas/etc - support@FullerSystems.com **

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Great for free game for new and experienced players alike. The game has an ongoing walkthrough, so it\'s easy to to install and play straight away. This is my most used download game by far.
reviews.author: Stevie George

reviews.title: Good setup.
reviews.comment: I\'ve played other crib apps, this one runs smoothly, scoring is accurate, and super easy to figure out who has the crib. Good job.
reviews.author: Mimi Alvior

reviews.title: Computer seems to get the cut
reviews.comment: Overall, the game is well done, however at higher levels  the cuts don\'t seem fair.  Would like to see local multiplayer game play offered.
reviews.author: Kurt brochu

reviews.title: Classic crib
reviews.comment: A great version of our old fave. If you think cribbage is fun, try Crib-B-Gone! Can\'t wait for the app of the new board game that is an exciting spin on this classic.
reviews.author: Sarah Clendenon

reviews.title: Since last update
reviews.comment: This game was awesome til the last update.  Now it is virtually impossible to win consistantly.  The computer hits on everything, all the time.  I uninstalled the app.  They can go kiss it.
reviews.author: Fred Bennethum

reviews.title: Very good implementation
reviews.comment: Everything you need. For me the intermediate level is perfect (I win almost exactly 50%), it\'s slick and stable. Not wild about the landscape layout but overall excellent.
reviews.author: Gary Shrimpton

reviews.title: Great game for cribbage players.
reviews.comment: A great game to learn more about the game of cribbage. I have thoroughly enjoyed playing all levels.
reviews.author: Tom Green

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: I don\'t feel like there is no chance to win. It feels equal. I really enjoy playing.
reviews.author: Linda Smith

reviews.title: Well designed
reviews.comment: The best card game ever just got better! Nothing but great cribbage! Good job Dec
reviews.author: Jim Denton

reviews.title: Fun time waster
reviews.comment: I like the graphics and ease of play. I\'m no pro so can\'t ask for more.  Pretty much 50 50 on intermediate level..
reviews.author: AE Clark

reviews.title: Great game on it\'s own. Just needs live auto player input.
reviews.comment: I rather play live right off the bat.
reviews.author: Alan Kairo

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good easy to see and understand game. Just right for passing the time chilling out in bed at the end of the day.
reviews.author: Pete Williams

reviews.title: Excellent way of practising & polishing tactics.
reviews.comment: The primary failing is that I cannot find a way if playing 2 people on the one device. We don\'t always want, or need, or have, an internet connection.
reviews.author: Denise Bridge

reviews.title: Good cribbage app
reviews.comment: Plays well, both in interface and AI
reviews.author: Eric Johnston

reviews.title: Really enjoyed playing anytime passed the time for sure.
reviews.comment: Passed the time for me worked as great tool to keep me going and awake when needed!
reviews.author: Jim Patton

reviews.title: Kliip rewards?
reviews.comment: Excellent game play, but kliip rewards do not wor anymore :(  game freezes when trying to claim, and the claim screen does not come up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'d be a little cooler if the cards had little animations when being played, but from a gameplay standpoint the game duplicates cribbage perfectly.
reviews.author: Kyle Connoy

reviews.comment: A free cribbage app available in full pay version. Many settings to customize your game for most enjoyable play.\tI play it all the time, considering buying the full version for interactive play.
reviews.author: Shelley KJ

reviews.title: Great traditional card game
reviews.comment: This is an good way of playing this taditional - 17th century - english card game. I don\'t see it played around the country very much these days and this app will help to keep the game alive. Really good graphics and connectivity with other players too.  On the downside, the advanced option in particular seems to be heavily biased in the apps favour - too often it has massive hands with the turned over card a perfect fit for a high score -  the player\'s options are too often pretty poor and do not refelect my experience with cards - how many times a picture card at the top + an ace at the other end with nothing to choose in between. It then gets a bit boring.
reviews.author: Ray Buttifant

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: simple controls easy to follow and I believe it plays smoother than Hoyle card games cribbage
reviews.author: Jim Baulch
